column1: Sum({$ <[Region Name]={"Central"}> }[Sales Margin Amount])/Sum({$ <[Region Name]={"Central"}> }[Sales Amount])

column2: if(Sum([Sales Margin Amount])/Sum([Sales Amount]) < 0,0,Sum([Sales Margin Amount])/Sum([Sales Amount]))

column1: Sum({$ <[Region Name]={"Northeast"}> }[Sales Margin Amount])/Sum({$ <[Region Name]={"Northeast"}> }[Sales Amount])

column2: if((sum([YTD Sales Amount])-sum([LY YTD Sales Amount]))/sum([LY YTD Sales Amount])>-0.45, (sum([YTD Sales Amount])-sum([LY YTD Sales Amount]))/sum([LY YTD Sales Amount]), 0 )

column1: (sum([YTD Sales Amount])-sum([LY YTD Sales Amount]))/sum([LY YTD Sales Amount])
Sum({$ <[Region Name]={"Southern"}> }[Sales Margin Amount])/Sum({$ <[Region Name]={"Southern"}> }[Sales Amount])
(sum([YTD Sales Amount])-sum([LY YTD Sales Amount])*0.2)/sum([LY YTD Sales Amount])
Sum({$ <[Region Name]={"Western"}> }[Sales Margin Amount])/Sum({$ <[Region Name]={"Western"}> }[Sales Amount])
